revised_title: Investigation of Regularly Shaped Stones and Their Formation in Gascony
tldr: The author examines the formation of regularly shaped stones found near Bagneres in Gascony, investigating their composition and growth process. The stones are discovered in a unique type of slate and are accompanied by transparent fibers, suggesting a possible role in their formation. The author also discusses the presence of these stones in other natural formations and their prevalence in the region.
